name: Jo-Kai-Ju
description:
[Important]

The new upload is a fix for a glitch that did not allow the game to work :C

This game is a variation of Jokenpo.

Here you have three options: 

 - Shoot;

 - Reload;

 - Defend;

Attack - Need to reload to gain ammo.

Reload - Gains ammo.

Defend - Avoid taking damage from the enemy.

Credits:

 Assets: https://ansimuz.itch.io
